name: The Deer
description: "The Deer" is an educational inter足ac足tive expe足ri足ence for children.You'll be an ancient Deer during the Pleistocene (Ice Age) epoch and you'll discover everything about this marvelous era.Unfortunately there were no T-Rex during this age since they were already extinct millions of years before.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.6 GHz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 3.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 with 512MB VRAM; NVIDIA GeForce 8500 GT / AMD Radeon HD 4650 or greater Storage: 150 MB available space
